summary: Investigated algebraic representation theorem approach using Boolean Algebra with Operators. Found Mathlib has strong Boolean algebra basics but lacks modal operator infrastructure. Estimated 1500-2500 LOC for full algebraic approach vs 200-400 to fix current universal parametric sorries. Recommended completing universal parametric approach first, with hybrid algebraic layer as fallback.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of algebraic completeness approach including Mathlib infrastructure assessment, effort estimates, and hybrid approach recommendation
